page.description: Like Search and Detail View fields, Search > Properties and Detail View > Properties menus are also similar to the Grid > Propertiesmenus in function. You can use them to create the look and feel of the Search and Detail View boxes in your grid.

section.description: The Search and Detail View properties menus will not open if you do not first select the Read Only box on the Component Type page and then click the ' Grid contains a 'Search' part? ' and the ' Grid contains a detail 'View' part? ' check boxes. Properties fall into the categories of Display Settings, Lookup, Textbox Properties, Client Side Properties, Javascript, Time Picker Properties, and Row Properties. Refer to Customizing the Search Partand Customizing the Detail View.
